downloadTitle: Fiscal books integration between Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 and Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R2
downloadDescription: This white paper describes how to configure and use the Fiscal books integration between Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 SP1 RU8 and Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R2 to perform fiscal books analysis and reporting.

downloadFile.name: Fiscal books integration from AX 2009 to AX 2012.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/3/3/3/3335c2f9-5af2-40dd-8b5f-14dfd0df1880/Fiscal books integration from AX 2009 to AX 2012.pdf

detailsSection: This white paper describes how to configure and use the Fiscal books integration between Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 SP1 RU8 and Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R2 to perform fiscal books analysis and reporting. You can manage your business in Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009, and then transfer fiscal documents and inventory transactions to Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, where you can perform fiscal books reporting tasks.
detailsSection_file_name: Fiscal books integration from AX 2009 to AX 2012.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the manual in PDF file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
